definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="InitialHeal" type="Number">InitialHeal</variable><variable id="Divisor" type="Number">Divisor</variable><variable id="FinalHeal" type="Number">FinalHeal</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_healed</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_haspotioneffect"><field name="potion">CUSTOM:AntiHeal</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_set_health"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="health"><block inline="false" type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MINUS</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_health"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block inline="false" type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">DIVIDE</field><value name="A"><block type="custom_dependency_number"><field name="NAME">amount</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_potioneffectlevel"><field name="potion">CUSTOM:AntiHeal</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
